(1) Includes emissions related to the products we sell and services we use. Calculated according to spend-based and mass-based methods, applying category specific emission factors.
(2) Capital Goods is captured in Category 1 - Purchased Goods and Services
(3) Calculated according to the average-data method.
(4) Calculated using fuel-based method and spend-based method where fuel data was not available.
(5) Calculated according to the waste quantity, type, and treatment method.
(6) Emissions related to corporate travel, including flights, accommodation, and car rentals.
(7) Emissions related to all team member commuting. Calculated using the average data method.
(8) Direct use-phase emissions from the use of sold products.
(9) Emissions related to the disposal of the products we sell.
(10) Emissions of organisations in which we own a material share using the average-data method.
